name: FuelUp!
description:
Fuel Up is a resource management game where you must wisely manage your fuel.

    Fuel not only allows your spaceship to fly, but it also functions as health, and is the only thing you can use a currency. Fuel is always running out, so you must carefully collect more while avoiding oncoming enemy ships by either avoiding them entirely or shooting them down.

    The game controls like a cross between Asteroids and a Top-Down NES Racer.

W - Accelerates

S - Brakes/Reverses

A&D - Turn

LClick - Shoots

All sounds, assets, and code besides the games background music was created by myself.
